naslov: Otok Pag, Povljana, odlična investicija,  2 samostojeće kuće s bazenom (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: OTOK PAG, POVLJANA, dvije kuće s bazenom u funkciji turističkog iznajmljivanja  Lokacija: Otok Pag, Povljana u neposrednoj blizini kopna, Zadra i zračne luke Zadar (56km), 15-tak minuta vožnje automobilom do Paškog mosta. Povljanu zaokružuje 20 km šljunčanih, kamenih I pješčanih plaža.  Opis: Prodajemo dvije samostojeće kuće s bazenom. Svaka kuća nalazi se na vlastitoj parceli i međusobno graniče. Prva kuća građena je 2012. godine i u funkciji je turističkog najma. Ova vrlo interesantna apartmanska kuća od 150m2 s bazenom na mirnoj i lijepoj lokaciji, udaljena svega 800 m od mora, u mirnijem okruženju, daje razne mogućnosti od uživanja, do bavljenja iznajmljivanjem, čemu trenutno i kuća služi, tako da bi u tom slučaju, budući kupac samo nastavio baviti se turizmom. Kuća se sastoji od prizemlja i kata. U prizemlju i na katu se nalaze po jedan kompletno uređen dvosobni apartman. Svaki od apartmana sastoji se od dvije spavaće sobe, kuhinje s blagovaonom i dnevnim dijelom, kupaonom te natkrivenom terasom. Oba apartmana su klimatizirana.  Na okućnici se nalazi bazen sa grijanom vodom putem toplinske pumpe, terasa, roštilj, sunčalište, vanjski toalet i tuš. Parking za više auta. Druga kuća s bazenom, novija, modernijeg stila, građena je 2020 godine. Sastoji se od prizemlja i kata ukupne kvadrature 244 m2. Prizemlje se sastoji od ulaza, kuhinje s blagovaonom i dnevnim boravkom s izlazom na bazen I natkrivenu terasu, wc-a. Kat vile sastoji se od tri spavaće sobe sa svojim vlastitim kupaonicama, vešeraja i wc. Vanjski dio predstavlja i prostor za cijelodnevno druženje, aktivnosti na bazenu i odmaranje, pa je uz bazen odlično ukomponirana natkrivena ljetna kuhinja s vanjskim boravkom, sunčalište te vanjski wc i tuš. Kuća je u potpunosti namještena vrlo kvalitetnim i modernim najmeštajem. Sve prostorije su klimatizirane, a u prizemlju je podno grijanje na dizalicu topline. Postavljen je video nadzor. Bazen je dimenzija 4x8 sa sistemom za grijanje vode. Vile mogu služiti za odmor, ali i za bavljenje turizmom. Kuće se nalaze jedna pored druge što ujedno otvara razne mogućnosti korištenja, što može biti interesantno za veće obitelji ili za ozbiljnije bavljenje turizmom. Za više informacija kontaktirajte nas: email: info@ambienta-nekretnine.hr tel.:   +38598520673 Agenciijska provizija za kupca 3%+PDV od postignute kupoprodajne cijene. THE ISLAND OF PAG, POVLJANA, two houses with swimming pools for tourist rental for sale. Location: Island of Pag, Povljana in the immediate vicinity of the mainland, Zadar and Zadar airport (56 km), about 15 minutes by car to the Pag bridge. Povljana is surrounded by 20 km of pebble, stone and sandy beaches. Description: We are selling two detached houses with a swimming pool. Each house is located on its own plot and they border each other. The first house was built in 2012 and is used as a tourist rental. This very interesting apartment house of 150 m2 with a swimming pool in a quiet and beautiful location, only 800 m from the sea, in a quieter environment, offers various possibilities from enjoyment to renting, which is what the house is currently for, so in that case, since the customer just continued to deal with tourism.The house consists of two floors. On the ground floor and on the first floor there is a fully furnished two-room apartment. Each of the apartments consists of two bedrooms, a kitchen with a dining room and a living room, a bathroom and a covered terrace. Both apartments are air-conditioned. In the garden there is a swimming pool with water heated by a heat pump, a terrace, a barbecue, a sunbathing area, an outdoor toilet and a shower.Parking for several cars. The second house with a pool, a newer, more modern style, was built in 2020. It consists of a ground floor and a first floor with a total square footage of 244 m2. The ground floor consists of an entrance, kitchen with dining room and living room with access to the pool and covered terrace, toilet. The first floor of the villa consists of three bedrooms with their own bathrooms, laundry room and toilet. The outdoor part is also a space for all-day socializing, activities at the pool and resting, so the covered summer kitchen with outdoor living room, sunbathing area and outdoor toilet and shower are perfectly integrated next to the pool. The house is fully furnished with high-quality and modern furniture. All rooms are air-conditioned, and the ground floor has underfloor heating with a heat pump. Video surveillance was installed. The pool is 4x8 with a water heating system. Villas can be used for vacation, but also for tourism. The houses are located next to each other, which at the same time opens up various possibilities of use, which can be interesting for larger families or for more serious tourism.
